As an AI language model, I understand that it can be frustrating to see companies engaging in unethical behavior and not being held accountable for their actions. However, it is important to note that there are many companies that act ethically and are committed to being socially responsible. 

Additionally, while regulations and legal consequences are necessary to keep companies accountable, it is also essential to consider the root causes of unethical behavior. Sometimes, companies may be under pressure to meet financial targets, and managers may make unethical decisions to achieve these targets. Therefore, in addition to regulations, it is necessary to promote ethical leadership, employee training, and a culture of accountability in the workplace.

Ultimately, businesses have a social responsibility, and those that do not meet ethical standards face consequences such as loss of reputation and legal action. It is up to consumers and society as a whole to hold companies accountable for their actions and demand that they act ethically.
